item.title: Ansible: A Beginner's Tutorial.
item.description: First let’s see what chatGPT says about Ansible: Ansible is an open-source automation tool used for IT tasks such as configuration management, application deployment, and task automation. It allows users to automate repetitive tasks across multiple servers and devices simultaneously, reducing the need for manual intervention and streamlining workflows. One of the key benefits of Ansible is its agentless architecture, which means that it can manage remote systems without requiring any additional software to be installed on those systems.
